title: Process a Lease Renewal
description: A tenant whose lease is expiring in 60 days has agreed to renew. The agent must generate and send the renewal agreement.

tasks.description: Identify the tenant's current lease and the agreed-upon renewal terms (e.g., 12 months, 3% rent increase).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the lease and renewal terms.

tasks.description: Generate a new lease agreement with the updated dates, rent amount, and terms.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a legally compliant lease renewal document.

tasks.description: Send the lease renewal to the tenant for electronic signature.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully sends the document for signing.
